OptionPackage.DisplayName: G130, G150, S120, S150, SINAMICS MV, S210

Comment.MultiLanguageText: max. tolerable pulse-peak between two cycles (error detection)
error: an intolerable pulse-peak was detected
pulses since last update-interval for speed-calculation
delay-off for debouncing of signal "conveyor is running"

LineComment.Text: reset when reset or rising-edge of i_mRun
- consider overflow-situations (overflow forward, overflow backward) - check for pulse-peak
copy update-interval to local-temp for better performance
correct update-interval for speed-calculation if necessary
SPEED CALCULATION: check if update-time is reached
convert time to DINT (e.a. T#2530ms -> 2530). Use x.ET directly for better accurracy
calc speed: dSpeedCalcInterval has unit [ms]. Multiplied with 60000 results unit [min]
calc averaged speed (speed of this cycle + speed of last cycle) / 2
save speed of this cycle for next cycle
